addon.name: XOT-Uzg.v3 stream collection for Radio and TV

extension.summary: XOT-Uzg.v3 is a plugin/script that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: Set of Dutch radio channels for XOT-Uzg.v3. These Radio channels are part of BigFoot87's stream collection and the TV channels are part of NL TV on Navi-X. Credits go to them.
